popups-message: Name shown in user preference for this extension
popups-redirects:
Unused at this time.

Message shown when the hovercard is showing a redirected page.

Parameters:
* $1 - Redirect target page
popups-settings-title: Title used for the setting's dialog
popups-settings-option-simple:
Title for the reader hovercard option
{{Identical|Enable}}
popups-settings-option-simple-descriptio: Description for the reader hovercard option
popups-settings-option-advanced:
Title for the editor or navigation popups option
{{Identical|Advanced}}
popups-settings-option-advanced-descript: Description for the editor or navigation popups option
popups-settings-save:
Save buttton for the setting's dialoag
{{Identical|Save}}
popups-settings-help-ok:
Confirmation button after showing how to re-enable hovercards.
{{Identical|Done}}
popups-settings-cancel:
Cancel button for the setting's dialog
{{Identical|Cancel}}
popups-settings-help: Help text explaining how to re-enable previews
popups-send-feedback:
Tooltip for the send feedback icon on the hovercard. Should mention that its an external link.
{{Identical|Send feedback}}
popups-preview-no-preview: The message shown to the user when a preview can't be generated.
popups-preview-footer-read:
The link shown to the user when a preview can't be generated.
{{Identical|Read}}
prefs-reading: Title for 'Reading preferences' section on preferences page
popups-prefs-optin-title: Title for Page Previews option Description for Page previews option
popups-prefs-optin-enabled-label:
Label for Page Previews opt in
{{Identical|Enable}}
popups-prefs-optin-disabled-label:
Label for Page previews opt out
{{Identical|Disable}}
popups-prefs-disable-nav-gadgets-info: Help message telling to disable Navigation Popups gadget in order to enable Page Previews. Parameters: $1 - link to Preferences page
popups-prefs-conflicting-gadgets-info: Help message informing about possible conflicts with other gadgets/customizations
